text: Thanks to the tutor in the centre that my son managed to pull through his N levels science papers. Though he enrolled late ( maybe 6 mths prior to the exams) and was failing his sciences, he eventually passed his papers thks to the tutors. They are patient, helpful and encouraging. Kudos to them!

Ms Wong is a very patient teacher, she is willing to go through topics over and over if you don’t understand. she will go the extra mile just to make sure you understand. she has taught me since i was in primary school till secondary school. i’m so happy for her and her tutelage. Even till today i still remember all the things she taught me, she even seen me grow and move on to tertiary.

Mrs Wong is a very patient and knowledgable teacher, and helped to boost my science grade from C6 in my Sec 3 EOYs to A2 for O levels. She is always ready to answer my questions and go through things that I am unsure about.

I would highly recommend this place as it provides a conducive learning environment for your child. The tutor does a great job in simplifying difficult concepts for ease of understanding, while ensuring the lessons are conducted in a fun and enjoyable manner!
ms jolie is very nice and funny! she’s also very patient and helped me improve my results drastically within a few months! :D
